name: Classic Flappy Bird in Unity
description:
This is my first EVER game made in Unity. I know that this is a bad example of what a game in Unity should look like but this is my FIRST published game from using Unity Game Engine.

I have been using the Unity Game Engine for awhile now and I have come to enjoy using it the most, more-so than the other game engines I have used.

You guys should expect more stuff from me.... and better things too!
